abstracts.abstract: Housing for Veterans;  Establishes Homes for Veterans Property Management Incentive Pilot Program in certain counties, requires Florida Housing Finance Corporation, in consultation with other entities & persons, to oversee specified aspects of pilot program; provides responsibilities of corporation for pilot program; requires contracted program administrators to maintain certain functions of pilot program; authorizes certain landlords to apply to contracted program administrator to request funding from Vacancy Relief Trust Fund & Risk Mitigation Trust Fund; provides purpose of such trust funds; requires landlord to submit to contracted program administrator required documentation within specified time period to apply for either trust fund; requires certain case managers to assist contracted program administrator; requires contracted program administrator to maintain & provide certain documentation to corporation; requires entity responsible for certain functions to maintain any supporting documentation; authorizes corporation to rely on certifications, determinations, & documentation provided by specified entities; authorizes landlord to apply for up to specified dollar amount from Risk Mitigation Trust Fund; provides requirements to apply for Risk Mitigation Trust Fund; provides that funding for pilot program is awarded on first-come, first-served basis; authorizes corporation to suspend acceptance of applications; requires specified notice.
